title: BUSINESS ENGLISH
content:
A：I hate this. I get so much spam e-mail every day.

B：Me, too. I’ve set up a long black list, but it still keeps coming.

A：How do you set up the black list, could you show me?

B：Sure, but I doubt it’ll do any good.

A：我的e-mail每天都會收到一堆垃圾郵件，好煩啊！

B：我也是，明明擋信名單都已經落落長了，卻還一直有人寄來。

A：擋信名單怎麼設定，可以教我一下嗎？

B：好啊，但我覺得沒什麼效果就是了。
